SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y'
AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(P.PURCHASE_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd'), 'yy/MM/dd') >= TO_DATE(#{ startDate }, 'yy/MM/dd') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(P.PURCHASE_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd'), 'yy/MM/dd') <= TO_DATE(#{ endDate }, 'yy/MM/dd')
AND P.ORDER_STATUS = #{ searchStatus }
AND P.PURCHASE_NO LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND M.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'

SELECT P.PURCHASE_NO , P.PURCHASE_DATE , P.USE_POINT , P.PURCHASE_PRICE , P.PICKUP_DATE , P.PICKUP_PLACE , P.PICKUP_TIME , P.ORDER_STATUS , P.STATUS , P.REFUND_DATE , P.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE , O.PRODUCT_NO , T.TYPE_NAME , PR.PRODUCT_KNAME , O.OD_COUNT , O.OD_PRICE , PA.PAY_METHOD FROM PURCHASE P LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDER_DETAIL O ON(P.PURCHASE_NO = O.PURCHASE_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PR ON(O.PRODUCT_NO = PR.PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN TYPE T ON(PR.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO) LEFT JOIN PAYMENT PA ON(P.PURCHASE_NO = PA.PURCHASE_NO) WHERE O.PURCHASE_NO = #{ purchaseNo }
